review: I have been buying these binders for three years straight already. If you're using these for school reasons, they're MOST LIKELY going to break by the end of the year. The cardboard material they use isn't very sturdy and ultimately tends to break/decay by the end of the year.However, during the year, the binders never failed me (except sometimes when the ring doesn't close evenly)This is also a very great price for a decent product. Recommend.
productTitle: Avery Durable View Binder with 2 inch Slant Rings, White, Pack of 4 (17577)
